title: YES! A Beauty and the Beast Musical Production Is Coming to Disney Cruise Line
text:
Beauty and the Beast Disney Cruise Show YES! A Beauty and the Beast Musical Production Is Coming to Disney Cruise Line March 16, 2017 
Image Source: Flickr user hyku 
Dancing dinnerware, singing pots and pans, and popping Champagne bottles? Yep, pretty much since 1991, we've wanted to "be the guest" at Beauty and the Beast 's epic party. Well, buckle up, Disney Cruise fans, because starting in November, when you hop aboard the Disney Dream, you can join in on the musical action with Belle and friends. 
Disney Cruise Lines just announced the introduction of a new Beauty and the Beast stage spectacular. The musical production will draw inspiration from the live-action film coming out March 17, featuring songs from the original Disney movie as well as two songs from the new film. The production of "Be Our Guest" sounds SO good and has been completely reimagined for the stage. 
"'Be Our Guest' is becoming a multi-course French dinner rooted in imagination and fantasy," Disney Cruise Line said. "Rousing choreography and dazzling visual effects will fill the stage during this full-fledged spectacle." ADVERTISEMENT 
The costumes promise to be elaborate, the music promises to be romantic and charming, and the numbers will undoubtedly be showstopping. Book your cruise and catch the show starting Nov. 6!
